GeneDef.label: true form (angelic)

customEffectDescriptions.li: Gene has reduced effect on already large pawns.

GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can transform into a larger more powerful form temporarily, the power of which is determined by the amount of Soul Power possessed. Sprouts glorious feathered wings, a halo, and gains increased ability to resist injury.

GeneDef.label: true form (demonic)

customEffectDescriptions.li: Gene has reduced effect on already large pawns.

GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can transform into a larger more powerful form temporarily, the power of which is determined by the amount of Soul Power possessed. Sprouts frightening wings, talons, and gains the ability to breathe fire.

GeneDef.label: goliath form

customEffectDescriptions.li: Gene has reduced effect on already large pawns.

GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can transform into a larger more powerful form temporarily, the power of which is determined by the amount of Soul Power possessed. The form of a goliath is incredible resilient.

GeneDef.label: true form (demonic, hemogenic)

customEffectDescriptions.li: Gene has reduced effect on already large pawns.

GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can transform into a larger more powerful form temporarily, the power of which is determined by the amount of Soul Power possessed. Sprouts frightening wings, talons, and gains the ability to breathe fire.\n\nThis is a hemogenic version, trading resources for more rapid reuse and reset of true-form abilities.
